paragraphs.text: Unfortunately, unlike many other mental disorders, Malignant Narcissism makes its sufferers actively dangerous to other people. It’s more akin to delusional schizophrenia than it is to anxiousness.
paragraphs.name: 897b
ed4d
paragraphs.text: Which is apropos, because nearly 60,000 mental health professionals have diagnosed President Donald Trump with a type of insanity that is often compared to an alcoholic’s lack of honesty and impulse control. Sparked by Change.org petitions by a top former Johns Hopkins professor and a California congresswoman, the psychiatric community has declared that Trump suffers from “Malignant Narcissism.”

When Trump defends accusations of racism by calling someone else a racist, that’s psychological projection. He does this sort of thing all the time. One of the most surprising moments of Trump’s presidential debates with Hillary Clinton was the time she accused him of being a Russian puppet, and he automatically projected the accusation — with nothing close to evidence — directly back on her:
paragraphs.name: 33a2

paragraphs.text: Preoccupied with fantasies of unlimited success, power, brilliance; Believes he is “special” and unique
paragraphs.name: 7d0e

1b4d0cf3ec67.title: “ Being a standard deviation or two away from the norm when it comes to one’s psychology does not…

paragraphs.text: “ Being a standard deviation or two away from the norm when it comes to one’s psychology does not automatically make a person dangerous, bad, or unable to do a job. Millions of people have depression, anxiety, or mild mania and still function well. Abraham Lincoln went through depression, after all.”
paragraphs.name: 9e26

paragraphs.text: Shane, I find your article spot on. I am a psychiatrist and I warned everyone about the perils of Trump long before the election. afed35ad9a70.title: I still have to question the professional ethics of any mental health worker who would diagnose…

paragraphs.text: I still have to question the professional ethics of any mental health worker who would diagnose someone they have never met. But kudos for an extremely good example of persuasive writing and defusing objections. I don’t agree with your conclusion, but you did a darn good job of presenting it.

b4a108903486.title: Shane Snow, what an impressive analysis of the USA president.

paragraphs.text: Shane Snow, what an impressive analysis of the USA president. You have taken the time to back up your thoughts (and our own) with some evidence. It sure is scary to be watching this character’s behavior unfold. Next we really should see an analysis of persons who feel inclined to vote and support him. Maybe you should do a special on the GOP leaders as a fist follow up! Quite good!
